name: Northwood Heights
description:
Northwood Heights is an interactive narrative that focuses on the character, Leo, and his journey to find the truth. Leo has discovered a possible THM in Northwood’s Heights water that is affecting its population. How will Leo address this problem knowing that the Mayor is possibly behind it? Through various clues, the player will interact with objects and guide themselves through the narrative to solve the mystery.

Controls:

  1. Movement - WASD
  2. Jump - Space
  3. Run - Shift
  4. Interact - F
  5. Close UI/Menu - E

Links:

  1. https://teamtitan5.artstation.com/projects/G88Wb1
  2.  https://github.com/NorthTITAN10/north-heights
